title: Sasaki And Miyano: First Year Students - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted from Manga   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Visual Novel   Based on a Visual Novel   Based on an Anime   Caring Protagonist   Collection of Short Stories   Cute Story   First Love   Fujoshi   Handsome Male Lead   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Student Council
author: Kotoko Hachijou
description:
Miyano, a fudanshi, is on the Disciplinary Committee and is a first-year high school student. Furthermore, there seems to be really unique people around him ......?

This novel is a collection of one-shots about the characters in their first year, told in a non-chronological order.

In addition to a novel depicting the daily lives of high school boys, a manga drawn by Sho Harusono himself is included.>
